name: GOLDASH
description:
Welcome to Goldash!

Goldash is an endless runner mobile game with platforming elements, in which you play the role of Trasher, a cleaner robot tasked with collecting all of Goldash’s trash. Jump to avoid dangers and defeat enemies, but be careful not to explode from Trasher’s OverHeating.

Controls PC Controls (Windows)

🖱 Jump: left mouse button click.

🖱 Fast fall: left mouse button click while Trasher is jumping.

Mobile Controls (Android)

📱 Jump: tap screen once.

📱 Fast fall: tap screen a second time while Trasher is jumping.

Gameplay

🔥 Jump to avoid obstacles and Enemy Robots, but be careful to not Jump too much because your heat will start increasing, if you reach the max level of heat, you will be overheated and you'll explode!

❄️ The OverHeating can be decreased by landing on Enemy Robots, thus defeating them, or by picking up Ice Cubes / NoOverHeating Power-Ups.

🗑 During the run collect trash to score points! The trash collected will be automatically exchanged for Gears.

🌟 There are three kinds of consumable Power-Ups that can be picked up during a run: Ice Cubes = NoOverHeating, Shield = Invulnerability, and 3X = multiply the points scored and Gears gained.

🆙 The Gears will allow you to upgrade your Power-Ups and buy awesome Skins!

✅ If you want more Gears and Skins, make sure that you complete the Achievements!


Requirements to play

Goldash runs on:

💻 Windows

📱 Android

Made by Qizue Team

Goldash has been developed as group project by Qizue Team for DBGA’s online courses in Game Programming and Game Design: this little game has been made in 3 months of hard work and by going through all the steps of games' development.
